title: Trump Primes Bitcoin And Crypto For A Price Game-Changer Predicted To ‘Unleash’ Trillions
description: The U.S. Senate is poised to vote on the Trump administration’s landmark stablecoin bill, predicted to "unleash" trillions of dollars...
content: Bitcoin and crypto have surged this year as traders bet U.S. president Donald Trumps administration will further boost the bitcoin price (helped by Treasury secretary Scott Bessent issuing a surprise… [+5002 chars]
